a_complex_condition_with_complex_error_m.description: A list of names that must be 3-24 lowercase letters and numbers.

a_list_maximum_minimum_length.description: A list variable that must have a length greater than 0 and less than 10

a_map_maximum_minimum_entries.description: A map variable that must have greater than 0 and less than 10 entries

a_number_enum_kind_1.description: A number variable that must be one of the values 1, 2, or 3

a_number_enum_kind_2.description: A number variable that must be one of the values 1, 2, or 3

a_number_exclusive_maximum_minimum.description: A number variable that must be greater than 0 and less than 10

a_number_maximum_minimum.description: A number variable that must be between 0 and 10 (inclusive)

a_set_maximum_minimum_items.description: A set variable that must have a length greater than 0 and less than 10

a_string_enum_escaped_characters_kind_1.description: A string variable that must some complicated escaped characters

a_string_enum_escaped_characters_kind_2.description: A string variable that must some complicated escaped characters

a_string_enum_kind_1.description: A string variable that must be one of the values 'a', 'b', or 'c'

a_string_enum_kind_2.description: A string variable that must be one of the values 'a', 'b', or 'c'

a_string_length_over_defined.description: A string variable that must have length 4

a_string_maximum_minimum_length.description: A string variable that must have a length less than 10 and greater than 0

a_string_multiple_validation_conditions.description: A string which has a minimum and maximum length, defined as 2 separate validation blocks

a_string_pattern_1.description: A string variable that must be a valid IPv4 address

a_string_pattern_2.description: string that must be a valid colour hex code in the form #RRGGBB

a_string_set_length.description: A string variable that must have length 4

an_object_maximum_minimum_items.description: An object variable that must have fewer than 3 properties
